issue.title: [Rust] Update Rust README to reflect new functionality
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-3883](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-3883). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
The Rust README is now very outdated and needs updating before we release 0.12.0
